name: botnet-battle.online
description:
Surpass your friends in this multiplayer fighting game completely made by hand (during the jam) where winning a fight means building his army of deadly robots !

To do so here are your tools : 

Move with w/a/s/d

Attack with your sword by pressing left click

Block an attack using your shield with right click

Dashing through the wind is a power granted by space bar

Pro tips: attack before dash to take your ennemy by surprise

Fun tip : attack your ally to throw them away

Be better and gain in power through your robots but be carefull, if you die they will return to a wild life. You are a robot, you fight robots you build an army of robots, robots, robots ALWAYS MORE ROBOTS !!

Stay alive, expand your army and climb to the top of the scorebord
